_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

TenderStatus.description: A document sent by the Contracting Party to an Economic Operator describing the status of a tendering procedure.

TenderStatus.title: Tender Status. Details
TenderStatus.description: A document sent by the Contracting Party to an Economic Operator describing the status of a tendering procedure.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Tender Status. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Tender Status. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Tender Status. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Tender Status. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Tender Status. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CopyIndicator.title: Tender Status. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Tender Status. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

ContractFolderID.title: Tender Status. Contract Folder Identifier. Identifier
ContractFolderID.description: An identifier, assigned by the sender, for the process file (i.e., record) to which this document belongs.

IssueDate.title: Tender Status. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Tender Status. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

ContractName.title: Tender Status. Contract Name. Name
ContractName.description: Short title of a contract associated with this Tender.

Note.title: Tender Status. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

ProcedureCode.title: Tender Status. Procedure Code. Code
ProcedureCode.description: A code signifying the type of this tendering procedure.

TenderSubmissionDeadlinePeriod.title: Tender Status. Tender Submission Deadline_ Period. Period
TenderSubmissionDeadlinePeriod.description: The period during which tenders must be delivered.

InvitationSubmissionPeriod.title: Tender Status. Invitation Submission_ Period. Period
InvitationSubmissionPeriod.description: The period during which invitations to tender must be completed and delivered.

ParticipationRequestReceptionPeriod.title: Tender Status. Participation Request Reception_ Period. Period
ParticipationRequestReceptionPeriod.description: The period during which requests for participation must be completed and delivered.

ProcurementLegislationDocumentReference.title: Tender Status. Procurement Legislation_ Document Reference. Document Reference
ProcurementLegislationDocumentReference.description: A reference to a document providing references to procurement legislation applicable to the tendering process.

FiscalLegislationDocumentReference.title: Tender Status. Fiscal Legislation_ Document Reference. Document Reference
FiscalLegislationDocumentReference.description: A reference to a document providing references to fiscal legislation applicable to the tendering process.

EnvironmentalLegislationDocumentReferenc.title: Tender Status. Environmental Legislation_ Document Reference. Document Reference
EnvironmentalLegislationDocumentReferenc.description: A reference to a document providing references to environmental legislation applicable to the tendering process.

EmploymentLegislationDocumentReference.title: Tender Status. Employment Legislation_ Document Reference. Document Reference
EmploymentLegislationDocumentReference.description: A reference to a document providing references to employment legislation applicable to the tendering process.

TenderStatusInquiryDocumentReference.title: Tender Status. Tender Status Inquiry_ Document Reference. Document Reference
TenderStatusInquiryDocumentReference.description: A reference to a received Tender status inquiry.

Signature.title: Tender Status. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

ContractingParty.title: Tender Status. Contracting Party
ContractingParty.description: The Contracting Party issuing the information about the tender status.

EconomicOperatorParty.title: Tender Status. Economic Operator Party
EconomicOperatorParty.description: The Economic Operator receiving the tender status information.

DocumentProviderParty.title: Tender Status. Document Provider_ Party. Party
DocumentProviderParty.description: The party that has the contract documents for the tendering process.

TenderRecipientParty.title: Tender Status. Tender Recipient_ Party. Party
TenderRecipientParty.description: The party to which tenders should be presented.

ProcurementProject.title: Tender Status. Procurement Project
ProcurementProject.description: An overall definition of this procurement project.

ProcurementProjectLot.title: Tender Status. Procurement Project Lot
ProcurementProjectLot.description: One of the procurement project lots into which this contract can be split.
